availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Lincoln County, Kentucky, miller. Virginia native. Son of Henry Bridgewater and Mary Franklin Bridgewater. Married to Emeline Shackleford on August 15, 1851. Miller in Lincoln County in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Lincoln, not stated, p. 168. Louisville Daily Express (Louisville, KY), September 13,1869. Find A Grave, “Augden Bridgewater (April 12, 1827-October 20, 1893),” Memorial #81139909, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi?page=gr&GRid=81139909 (accessed June 5, 2017).
